title: search-api: memory_spike triage pattern
summary: Common causes and first checks when search-api shows memory_spike.
first_checks: Check heap / RSS trends and GC pressure
Review recent changes touching caching
Check queue/backlog buffering in memory
Look for high-cardinality metrics or label explosions
Inspect payload sizes and response caching
checklist_copy_text:
On-call first checks:
- Check heap / RSS trends and GC pressure
- Review recent changes touching caching
- Check queue/backlog buffering in memory
- Look for high-cardinality metrics or label explosions
- Inspect payload sizes and response caching

title: orders-api: packet_loss triage pattern
summary: Common causes and first checks when orders-api shows packet_loss.
first_checks: Check NAT gateway/egress saturation metrics
Inspect service mesh release notes if recently updated
Compare packet loss across zones/nodes
Fail over traffic away from affected zone
Check node/network interface errors
checklist_copy_text:
On-call first checks:
- Check NAT gateway/egress saturation metrics
- Inspect service mesh release notes if recently updated
- Compare packet loss across zones/nodes
- Fail over traffic away from affected zone
- Check node/network interface errors

title: ingestion-worker: oom_kills triage pattern
summary: Common causes and first checks when ingestion-worker shows oom_kills.
likely_causes: large batch job running in same pod
container memory limit too low for peak load
first_checks: Review recent deploys for leak-prone changes
Confirm OOMKilled events and container limits
Check memory trend leading up to kill
Consider temporarily raising memory limits
Look for large batch jobs or spikes in payload size
checklist_copy_text:
On-call first checks:
- Review recent deploys for leak-prone changes
- Confirm OOMKilled events and container limits
- Check memory trend leading up to kill
- Consider temporarily raising memory limits
- Look for large batch jobs or spikes in payload size

title: orders-api: p99_latency triage pattern
summary: Common causes and first checks when orders-api shows p99_latency.
first_checks: Look for retry storms / elevated retries
Compare tail latency across pods/nodes
Check downstream RPC p99 latency
Check p99 per endpoint and payload size distribution
Inspect GC pause metrics and heap usage
checklist_copy_text:
On-call first checks:
- Look for retry storms / elevated retries
- Compare tail latency across pods/nodes
- Check downstream RPC p99 latency
- Check p99 per endpoint and payload size distribution
- Inspect GC pause metrics and heap usage

first_checks: Check migration jobs and locks

Inspect connection errors/timeouts in logs

title: recommendations: throttling triage pattern
summary: Common causes and first checks when recommendations shows throttling.
first_checks: Inspect retry rate and backoff behavior
Consider temporary limit increase for trusted clients
Review rate limit policy changes
Check gateway error responses and quotas
Check inbound traffic rate and top clients

On-call first checks:
- Inspect retry rate and backoff behavior
- Consider temporary limit increase for trusted clients
- Review rate limit policy changes
- Check gateway error responses and quotas
- Check inbound traffic rate and top clients

title: recommendations: p95_latency triage pattern
summary: Common causes and first checks when recommendations shows p95_latency.
likely_causes: cache miss spike increasing DB load
first_checks: Inspect DB connection count and pool saturation
Open trace view for top slow endpoints
Look at cache hit-rate and eviction metrics
Check recent deploys/rollouts for the service
Compare latency by availability zone / node
checklist_copy_text:
On-call first checks:
- Inspect DB connection count and pool saturation
- Open trace view for top slow endpoints
- Look at cache hit-rate and eviction metrics
- Check recent deploys/rollouts for the service
- Compare latency by availability zone / node

title: search-api: cache_miss_spike triage pattern
summary: Common causes and first checks when search-api shows cache_miss_spike.
likely_causes: cache eviction due to memory pressure
first_checks: Inspect redis cluster health/failover
Check for stampede patterns (synchronized misses)
Check cache eviction and memory pressure
Validate cache TTL and key namespace changes
Consider request coalescing / warming keys
checklist_copy_text:
On-call first checks:
- Inspect redis cluster health/failover
- Check for stampede patterns (synchronized misses)
- Check cache eviction and memory pressure
- Validate cache TTL and key namespace changes
- Consider request coalescing / warming keys
